review: I’ve been to a lot of fancy restaurants and rooftop bars in Kiev and I have to admit this is my favorite place so far. First, the rooftop bar (The Bar on 8) is amazing, there are beautiful sunsets, then there’s some really good food and an …
name: Dmitry B

review:
Dear Dmitry!

Thank you very much for such a glowing review of our Bar on 8 and Lobby Lounge, it gives us great pleasure to receive feedback like yours.
Please be assured that your comments have been shared with our team and that we look forward to seeing you again many more times.

Best regards,
Yuliia Tsviakh
Administrative Assistant F&B Manager
name: Mason Zain

review: Amazing food, fancy restaurant so be prepared to overspend but it’s worth it. I had the sea bass, mashed potatoes and crab/avocado sushi rolls. Very tasty.
name: Ani Yoseliani

review:
Dear Mason Zain!
Warmest greetings from Grill Asia!
Thank you so much for your visit and for your appreciation!
We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our food and atmosphere.

We are looking forward to welcoming you back again!
name: Daniel Gildin

review: The Asia Bar and Grill is an authentic and delicious establishment nestled in one of the Premier hotels of this city. Especially note worthy is the Brunch! which is held in collaboration with Helen Marlen. Wonderful experience, great staff and amazing food. We will be back ;)
name: Ameena J

review: Well appreciated, thank you
name: Jenia Poluektova

review:
Liked the restaurant until today.
I have booked a dinner for two on Valentine’s Day, when I arrived they told me that there is it “special “ menu instead of the regular one. …
name: Anjum Razzaque

review:
Dear Mr. Gildin,
It is extremely sad to hear that you were not informed about special menu while you were booking, please allow me bring my apologies to your attention and to invite you one of our next activities, Ladies Day Brunch on 8th of March or South American Brunch on 28th of March on complimentary basis in order to have one more chance for us to show our hospitality to you and your partner.
Once again, please accept our apologies for the inconvenient experience occurred
Kind Regards
Melih Yurtoren
Chef & F&B Director
name: Amal Hab

review: Food was really goood. One of the best tum yum soup I had in my life. Chief Phissan is amazing he was the one who prepared our food. Will definitaly be back.
name: Steve Lee

review: The food is great but the place is depressing and outdated (I think nothing changed in the last 10-15 years). For this price you can find better place. It seems that they have a good deal with Beijing duck for two for 2000 UAH on Fridays.
name: Itzhak Sean Kaploun

review:
Dear Jenia,
Well appreciated for your great word
We are really happy that you had great experience, thank you so much
We are currently working on renovation of venues with new concepts at Hotel, The new concepts will arrive in your offer as soon as all essentials come in right way all together.
Will be looking forward to hosting you again
Kind Regards
Melih
Chef
name: Selçuk Korkmaz

review: Food was good but over priced. Even though I was the only one of 3 or so customers the waitress was somewhat lazy even though the team leader (Elena) was very active in making sure guests were welcomed and were enjoying their resturant experience. Overall my experience is positive and I plan to visit the resturant again.
name: Ignacio A. Monteserin

review:
Dear Anjum Razzaque,
Thank you very much for your feedback. Thank you for your critical comments in particular. Of course, we will take everything in attention and try to correct some things.
Hoping for your return!
name: Martin Landolt

review:
Loved the noodles with chicken and shrimp and sushi was great
Good service but the order took long
name: Александр Сирко

review:
Dear Mr. Hab,

Your positive feedback is highly appreciated and we are glad that you had great experience at our restaurant. We always do our best to deliver high quality service to our guests and we apologize that your order took more time than you expected.
We look forward to seeing you again soon at our establishment!

Kind regards,
Yuliia Tsviakh
Administrative Assistant F&B Manager
name: Екатерина Бышовец

review: Excellent quality.  Everything fresh and high quality.  Friendly staff.  Pricey but very good.
name: Vladislaw Yurchenko

review:

review: Expensive and tasty food

review: My visit was on Sunday evening, early February 2018. After the opera ("Norma") I still had an appetite for a bite of Asian food. Really eaten very well! Starter (octopus), main course (duck leg), Ukrainian beer, …

review:

We will be glad to see you all the time!)

review: A good place where you can sit quietly and eat deliciously, but there are not enough partitions or some kind of table isolation (this is my personal complaint) …

review: Beautiful, effective cooking, tasty
